This "Privacy Policy" is designed to help you understand how UpHealth Inc., its affiliates, and its partners ("we" or "us") collect and process the information that you share with us when you use this website ("Site").

We will only collect personal identification information from you if you voluntarily submit such information to us.
We collect and use your personal information for the following purposes: To get in touch with you.
